issues_found: Square brackets in Write-Host debug messages causing array index errors
Incorrect escape sequences in regex patterns
Missing parenthesis escaping in string interpolation
fixes_applied: Removed square brackets from debug messages to prevent PowerShell interpretation as array indices
Fixed regex pattern escape sequences using backtick notation
Fixed string interpolation in recommendation insights

enhancements.response_processing: Enhanced Process-ResponseFile with better field extraction and debug logging
enhancements.decision_making: Improved test path extraction with multiple regex patterns
enhancements.priority_handling: Changed TEST actions to High priority
enhancements.documentation: Created comprehensive documentation for all 8 prompt types

validation_steps: Verify module imports without syntax errors
Check signal file creation and processing
